__TOC__
==Story==
{{VO/Story
|character           = Tartaglia
|language            = ja
|name                = タルタリヤ

<!-- Hello -->
|vo_01_01_title      = 初めまして…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 俺はファデュイ執行官第十一位、「公子」タルタリヤだ。そして君は&mdash;&mdash;争いを招く者だね、実に愉快だ。きっと相性がいいと思うよ。
|vo_01_01_rm         = Ore wa Fadyui Shikkoukan dai juuichii, "Koushi" Tarutariya da. Soshite kimi wa{{lmdash}} arasoi wo maneku mono da ne, jitsu ni yukai da. Kitto aishou ga ii to omou yo.
|vo_01_01_tl         = I'm the 11th Fatui Harbinger, "Childe" Tartaglia. And you are... an inviter of strife, very amusing. I think we will be compatible.

<!-- Chats -->
|vo_02_01_title      = 世間話・暇
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Idleness
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Idleness.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = ここに立ってても、相手はやってこないよ。
|vo_02_01_rm         = Koko ni tatte te mo, aite wa yatte konai yo.
|vo_02_01_tl         = Standing here isn't going to bring our enemies to us.

|vo_02_02_title      = 世間話・手合わせ
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Test of Skills
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Test of Skills.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = んーー、この辺りに戦い甲斐のある強敵はいないんだろうか？
|vo_02_02_rm         = Nnn, kono atari ni tatakai kai no aru kyouteki wa inai ndarou ka?
|vo_02_02_tl         = Hmm, I wonder if there are strong enemies worth fighting around here?

|vo_02_03_title      = 世間話・ファデュイ
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: The Fatui
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - The Fatui.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 他の執行官たちは何してるんだろうね。まあ、どうせ訳の分からない「壮大な計画」とやらを進めてるんだろうけど。
|vo_02_03_rm         = Hoka no Shikkoukan-tachi wa nani shiteru ndarou ne. Maa, douse wake no wakaranai "shoudai-na keikaku" to yara wo susumeteru ndarou kedo.
|vo_02_03_tl         = I wonder what the other Harbingers are doing. Well, they're probably just proceeding with their "grand plans" that don't make any sense.

|vo_02_04_title      = 世間話・故郷の雪原
|vo_02_04_subtitle   = Chat: Snezhnaya
|vo_02_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Snezhnaya.ogg
|vo_02_04_tx         = 俺の故郷の雪原でこんな風に立ってたら凍死してしまうよ、ハハハッ。
|vo_02_04_rm         = Ore no kokyou no setsugen de konna fuu ni tattetara toushi shiteshimauyo, hahaha'.
|vo_02_04_tl         = If you stand around in the snowfields of my homeland like this, you would freeze to death, hahaha.

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title      = 雨上がり…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = After the Rain
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} After the Rain.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 雨が水面を打つ音は魚を驚かしてしまう。それに比べ、雨上がりは釣りをするのに絶好の時間だ。
|vo_03_01_rm         = Ame ga suimen wo utsu oto wa sakana wo odorokashite shimau. Sore ni kurabe, ameagari wa tsuri wo suru no ni zekkou no jikan da.
|vo_03_01_tl         = The sound of rain hitting the surface of the water scares the fish. Compared to that, when the rain stops is the perfect time to go fishing.

|vo_03_02_title      = 雪の日・異国
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When It Snows: Foreign Country
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows - Foreign Country.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = ハハッ、故郷の方でも今は雪が降っているのかな？
|vo_03_02_rm         = Haha', kokyou no hou de mo ima wa yuki ga futte iru no ka na?
|vo_03_02_tl         = Haha, I wonder if it is snowing right now in my homeland too?

|vo_03_03_title      = 雪の日・スネージナヤ
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows: Snezhnaya
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows - Snezhnaya.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 素晴らしい雪だね！天地が月光のように綺麗だ。こんな舞台で流れる鮮血はより際立つだろうね。
|vo_03_03_rm         = Subarashii yuki da ne! Tenchi ga gekkou no you ni kirei da. Konna butai de nagareru kenketsu wa yori kiwadatsu darou ne.
|vo_03_03_tl         = What wonderful snow! The world is as beautiful as moonlight. The fresh blood that spills on this stage would shine ever so brighter.

|vo_03_04_title      = 風の日…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When It's Windy
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It's Windy.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = ほう、風から争いの気配を感じる。
|vo_03_04_rm         = Hou, kaze kara arasoi no kehai wo kanjiru.
|vo_03_04_tl         = Hmm, I feel the presence of strife in the wind.

|vo_03_05_title      = 暴風の日・異国
|vo_03_05_subtitle   = Wind Is Building Up: Foreign Country
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} Wind Is Building Up - Foreign Country.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx         = 清々しい風だ！
|vo_03_05_rm         = Sugasugashii kaze da!
|vo_03_05_tl         = The wind is so crisp!

|vo_03_06_title      = 暴風の日・スネージナヤ
|vo_03_06_subtitle   = Wind Is Building Up: Snezhnaya
|vo_03_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} Wind Is Building Up - Snezhnaya.ogg
|vo_03_06_tx         = 頭も体も、この身を通り抜ける風に洗われたようだ。気持ちいいね。
|vo_03_06_rm         = Atama mo karada mo, kono mi wo toorinukeru kaze ni arawareta you da. Kimochi ii ne.
|vo_03_06_tl         = It's as if both my mind and body are washed by the wind passing through me. It feels nice.

<!-- Greetings -->
|vo_04_01_title      = おはよう…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = やあ、相棒！今日は元気そうだね。
|vo_04_01_rm         = Yaa, aibou! Kyou wa genki sou da ne.
|vo_04_01_tl         = Hey, comrade! You look cheerful today.

|vo_04_02_title      = こんにちは…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 調子よさそうだ、俺と手合わせしてみるか？
|vo_04_02_rm         = Choushi yosasouda, ore to te awaseshite miru ka?
|vo_04_02_tl         = You seem to be in good shape, are you up for a spar with me?

|vo_04_03_title      = こんばんは…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = ぷはーーッ、食った食った。体を動かしてこよう。
|vo_04_03_rm         = Puhaaa', kutta kutta. Karada wo ugokashite koyou.
|vo_04_03_tl         = Haah, I ate I ate. I'll go move my body.

|vo_04_04_title      = おやすみ…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 楽しい一日だった。また明日だ、相棒！
|vo_04_04_rm         = Tanoshii ichinichi datta. Mata ashita da, aibou!
|vo_04_04_tl         = It was a fun day. See you tomorrow, comrade!

<!-- About Character -->
|vo_05_01_title      = タルタリヤ自身について…
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character}.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 戦士たる者、常に挑む心を刃の先に留めなければならない。勝とうが負けようが、それによりかけがえのない貴重な経験を得られるんだ。
|vo_05_01_rm         = Senshi taru mono, tsune ni idomu kokoro wo ha no saki ni tome nakereba naranai. Katou ga makeyou ga, sore ni yori kakegae no nai kichou-na keiken wo erareru nda.
|vo_05_01_tl         = A warrior must always keep the spirit of challenge on the edge of the blade. Win or lose, you gain invaluable and precious experience.

<!-- About Us -->
|vo_06_01_title      = 同僚について…
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Comrades
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Comrades.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 君と同行してることは、他の執行官の間でとうに広まってるだろうね。あいつらの顔を見てみたいもんだよ、ハハハッ。
|vo_06_01_rm         = Kimi to doukou shiteru koto wa, hoka no Shikkoukan no aida de tou ni hiromatteru darou ne. Aitsura no kao wo mite mitai mo nda yo, hahaha'.
|vo_06_01_tl         = It has probably spread among the other Harbingers that I'm travelling with you. I want to see their faces, hahaha.

|vo_06_02_title      = 武器について…
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Weapons
|vo_06_02_friendship    = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Weapons.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 実は弓が一番苦手な武器なんだ。だからこそ、使ってるよ。手強い相手ほど、征服し甲斐がある。
|vo_06_02_rm         = Jitsu wa yumi ga ichiban nigate-na buki nanda. Da kara koso, tsukatteru yo. Tegowai aite hodo, seifuku shigai aru.
|vo_06_02_tl         = Actually, the bow is the weapon I'm least adept with. That's precisely why I'm using it. The more formidable the enemy, the more satisfying it is to conquer.

|vo_06_03_title      = 生存について…
|vo_06_03_subtitle   = About Us: Survival
|vo_06_03_friendship    = 6
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Survival.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx         = 神の目を持たない君がこれほどの力を持つとは、実に楽しみだ…君が自身の限界に達する前に、すべてを捨てて俺と命を賭けた戦いをしよう、それまで絶対に倒れるなよ！死ぬなんてもってのほかだからね。
|vo_06_03_rm         = Kami no Me wo motanai kimi ga kore hodo no chikata wo motsu wa, jitsu ni tanoshimi da... Kimi ga jishin no genkai ni tassuru mae ni, subete wo sutete ore to inochi wo kaketa tatakai wo shiyou, sore made zettai ni taoreru na yo! Shinu nante motte no hoka da kara ne.
|vo_06_03_tl         = Even without a Vision, you have such power. I'm really looking forward to it... Before you reach your limits, let's throw everything away and fight to the death, you must not fold up until then! Dying is out of the question.

|vo_06_04_title      = 誘いについて…
|vo_06_04_subtitle   = About Us: Invitation
|vo_06_04_friendship    = 6
|vo_06_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Invitation.ogg
|vo_06_04_tx         = 相棒、ファデュイに入ってみないか？…いや、やっぱ今のはなし。今の君の立場だからこそ、一緒にいる俺に他の執行官と殺し合う理由ができるんだから。こんなチャンス、そう易々と捨てられるわけがないよね。
|vo_06_04_rm         = Aibou, Fadyui ni haitte minai ka? ...Iya, yappa ima no wa nashi. Ima no kimi no tachiba da kara koso, issho ni iru ore ni hoka no Shikkoukan to koroshiau riyuu ga dekiru nda kara. Konna chansu, sou yasuyasu to suterareru wake ga nai yo ne.
|vo_06_04_tl         = Comrade, do you want to try joining the Fatui? ...No, scratch that. Because of your current situation, I have a reason for me and the other Harbingers to kill each other. I can't throw away this chance so easily.

<!-- Miscellaneous I -->
|vo_07_01_title      = 「神の目」について…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the Vision
|vo_07_01_friendship    = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = ハハッ、強くなれるなら、「神の目」でも「邪眼」でも、アビスの罪人から学ぶことさえも厭わないさ…
|vo_07_01_rm         = Haha', tsuyoku nareru nara, "Kami no Me" de mo "Jagan" de mo, Abisu no zainin kara manabu koto sae mo itowanai sa...
|vo_07_01_tl         = Haha, as long as it would make me stronger, I'm willing to use a "Vision" or a "Delusion," or learn from the sinners from the Abyss...

|vo_07_02_title      = シェアしたいこと…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 果てしない雪原では、命はいつだって骨を砕くような一面の純白と隣り合わせで、足跡さえもそこには残せない。そう、俺たちは毎日見えない敵と戦っていたんだ。
|vo_07_02_rm         = Hate shinai setsugen de wa, inochi wa itsudatte hone wo kudaku you-na ichimen no junpaku to tonariawase de, ashiato sae mo soko ni wa nokosenai. Sou, ore-tachi wa mainichi mienai teki to tatakatte ita nda.
|vo_07_02_tl         = In the endless snowfields, life always exists alongside the bone-shattering surface of pure white, and not even footprints would remain. That's right, we were fighting the invisible enemy every day.

|vo_07_03_title      = 興味のあること…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = かつて俺は世界の深淵で巨大な魔獣とにらみ合った。いつの日か、あの骨さえも凍るような強大な怪物を正々堂々と倒してみせる。その時は、君に見届けてほしいんだ、相棒！
|vo_07_03_rm         = Katsute ore wa sekai no shin'en de kyodai-na majuu to niramiatta. Itsu no hi ka, ano hone sae mo kooru you-na kyoudai-na kaibutsu wo seiseidoudou to taoshite miseru. Sono toki wa, kimi ni mitodokete hoshii nda, aibou!
|vo_07_03_tl         = Back then, I came face to face with a colossal monster in this world's abyss. Someday, I will defeat that bone-chilling giant monster fair and square. When that time comes, I want you to bear witness, comrade!

<!-- About Others -->
|vo_08_01_title      = スカークについて…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Skirk]]
|vo_08_01_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Skirk.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = もう何年師匠に会ってないんだろうな。次に彼女と手合わせする時は、少なくとも両手を使わせてやりたいよ。
|vo_08_01_rm         = Mou nannen shisho ni atte nai ndarou na. Tsugi ni kanojo to teawase suru toki wa, sukunaku to mo ryoute wo tsukawasete yaritai yo.
|vo_08_01_tl         = It's been how many years since I last saw my master? The next time I spar with her, I want to make her use both hands.

|vo_08_02_title      = 鍾離について・推量
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Zhongli]]: Pondering
|vo_08_02_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Zhongli - Pondering.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = あいつは只者じゃないね、真の実力はどんなものだろうか…期待してしまうよ。
|vo_08_02_rm         = Aitsu wa tadamono ja nai ne, shin no jitsuryoku wa donna mono darou ka... Kitai shite shimau yo.
|vo_08_02_tl         = There's more to him than meets the eye, I wonder what his real power is like... It fills me with expectation.

|vo_08_03_title      = 鍾離について・挑戦
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About Zhongli: Challenge
|vo_08_03_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_03_quest    = A New Star Approaches
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Zhongli - Challenge.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 鍾離先生は最近どうしてる？うん…順調？どうやら「凡人」の生活にも慣れ始めたみたいだね。はぁ…いろいろあったけど、鍾離先生とも一回戦って見たいものだな。何…俺は勝てない？ハハッ…
|vo_08_03_rm         = Shouri-sensei wa saikin dou shiteru? Un... Junchou? Dou yara "bonjin" no seikatsu ni mo narehajimeta mitai da ne. Haa... Iroiro atta kedo, Shouri-sensei to mo ikkai tatakatte mitai mono da na. Nani... Ore wa katenai? Haha'...
|vo_08_03_tl         = How is Mr. Zhongli doing lately? Hm...he is doing well? It seems that he's getting used to the life of an "ordinary person". Haah...there's been a lot between us, but I want to try fighting Mr. Zhongli once. What... I can't win? Haha...

|vo_08_04_title      = 「女皇」について…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Tsaritsa]]
|vo_08_04_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Tsaritsa.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 女皇様は実に優しい人だよ。優しすぎるからこそ、冷酷にならなければならない。平和を夢見ているからこそ、世界に宣戦布告した。それに、彼女が世界の敵になったからこそ、俺たちは出会えたのさ。
|vo_08_04_rm         = Jokou-sama wa jitsu ni yasashii hito da yo. Yasashisugiru kara koso, reikoku ni nara nakereba naranai. Heiwa wo yumemite iru kara koso, sekai ni sensen fukou shita. Sore ni, Jokou ga sekai no teki ni natta kara koso, ore-tachi wa deaeta no sa.
|vo_08_04_tl         = The Tsaritsa is a really kind person. Because she is too kind, she must become merciless. Precisely because she dreams of peace, she declared war against the world. Besides, because she became the enemy of the world, we were able to meet.

|vo_08_05_title      = ファルカについて…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Varka]]
|vo_08_05_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = ファルカかい？いつか西風騎士団の頂点、伝説の「北風騎士」と戦えると思うと、興奮して震えてしまうよ。生きるって素晴らしいね。
|vo_08_05_rm         = Faruka kai? Itsuka Sepryurosu Kishidan no chouten, densetsu no "Hokufuu Kishi" to tatakaeru to omou to, koufun shite furuete shimau yo. Ikiru tte subarashii ne.
|vo_08_05_tl         = Varka? To think that I can fight the head of the Knights of Favonius, the legendary "Knight of Boreas" someday, makes me shiver with excitement. How wonderful it is to be alive.

|vo_08_06_title      = 「道化」について…
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Pierro|The Jester]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Jester.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 彼はファデュイ最初の執行官で、今の執行官たちのリーダーでもある。ただ、重要な場面でしか姿を見せないんだ。彼の功績については…正直、興味がない。俺が忠誠を誓うのは女皇様だからね。
|vo_08_06_rm         = Kare wa Fadyui saisho no Shikkoukan de, ima no Shikkoukan-tachi no riidaa de mo aru. Tada, juuyou-na bamen de shika sugata wo misenai nda. Kare no kouseki ni tsuite wa... shoujiki, kyoumi ga nai. Ore ga chuusei wo chikau no wa Jokou-sama da kara ne.
|vo_08_06_tl         = He's the first Fatui Harbinger, and also the current leader of the Harbingers. Though he doesn't appear that much unless they're important occasions. About his accomplishments... to be honest, I'm not interested at all. I only pledge my devotion to the Tsaritsa after all.

|vo_08_07_title      = 「隊長」について…
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Il Capitano|The Captain]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Captain.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 昔、戦場で彼の戦いを見たことがある。その姿はあまりに勇猛なものだったよ。ただ俺の席は後ろすぎる、たぶん彼は俺のことに気付いていなかっただろう。けど、たとえ今日見向きされなくても、明日こそは、俺の実力を彼に見せてやりたい。
|vo_08_07_rm         = Mukashi, senjou de kare no tatakai wo mita koto ga aru. Sono sugata wa amari ni yuumou-na mono datta yo. Tada ore no seki wa ushiro sugiru, tabun kare wa ore no koto ni kizuiteinakatta darou. Kedo, tatoe kyou mimuki sarenakutemo, ashita koso wa, ore no jitsuryoku wo kare ni misete yaritai.
|vo_08_07_tl         = Long time ago, I've seen his performance on the battlefield. He was such an intrepid man. But perhaps my rank is too low that he never noticed me at all. Today, even I'm still gonna be ignored, tomorrow I want to show him my true strength.

|vo_08_08_title      = 「博士」について…
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Il Dottore|The Doctor]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Doctor.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 彼は年齢別に自分の義体を作って、様々な任務を担当させているらしい。しょうがないさ、俺の同僚はみんな変わり者ばかりだからね。でも、逆に考えよう、仮に俺が自分の義体と出会ったら…ハハッ、きっと生き残るほうを決めるために、そいつと戦うことになるよね。
|vo_08_08_rm         = Kare wa nenreibetsu ni jibun no gitai wo tsukutte, samazama-na ninmu wo tantou saseteiru rashii. Shou ga nai sa, ore no douryou wa minna kawarimono bakari da kara ne. De mo, gyaku ni kangaeyou, kari ni ore ga jibun no gitai to deattara... Haha', kitto ikinokoru hou wo kimeru tame ni, soitsu to tatakau koto ni naru yo ne.
|vo_08_08_tl         = I heard that he've been creating his prostheses at different ages, sending them to different missions. Well it can't be helped, since all my comrades are all freaks. But, let's think the opposite, if I met my own prosthesis too... Haha, I would have to fight him and settle who's gonna survive from that battle.

|vo_08_09_title      = 「少女」について…
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Columbina|Damselette]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Damselette.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = ファトゥスの席は実力によって決まる。けど、なんであの子が「第三位」にいるのかはよく分からないんだ。もし機会があったら、俺より前にいる執行官たちと一度戦ってみたいね。ただ、どうしてか彼女とはあまり戦う気が起きないんだ…とにかく、君も気を付けたほうがいい。
|vo_08_09_rm         = Fatusu no seki wa jitsuryoku ni yotte kimaru. Kedo, nande ano ko ga "dai san'i" ni iru no ka wa yoku wakaranai nda. Moshi kikai ga attara, ore yori mae ni iru Shikkoukan-tachi to ichido tatakatte mitai ne. Tada, doushite ka kanojo to wa amari tatakau ki ga okinai nda... Tonikaku, kimi mo ki wo tsuketa hou ga ii.
|vo_08_09_tl         = The ranks of the Fatui Harbingers is decided from strength. But I still don't get it why that girl is "No.3". If I got a chance, I'd like to fight every Harbinger that's above my rank. Though I don't know why I don't feel like fighting with her... Anyway, you should be careful around her too.

|vo_08_10_title      = 「召使」について…
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Arlecchino|The Knave]]
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Knave.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 打算的な人は別に嫌いじゃない。何しろ、俺がファデュイに入ったのだって、戦う機会がもっと欲しいからだ。けど、俺はどうしてもこいつのことが気に入らない。裏切ることで利益を手にできるのなら、彼女は躊躇なく女皇様に刃を向けるだろう。彼女の目には、狂気しかないからね。
|vo_08_10_rm         = Dasanteki-na hito wa betsu ni kirai ja nai. Nani shiro, ore ga Fadyui ni haitta no datte, tatakau kikai ga motto hoshii kara da. Kedo, ore wa doushite mo koitsu no koto ga ki ni iranai, Uragiru koto de rieki wo te ni dekiru no nara, kanojo wa chuucho naku Jokou-sama ni yaiba wo mukeru darou. Kanojo no me ni wa, kyouki shika nai kara ne.
|vo_08_10_tl         = I don't really hate people who only care about their own ends. Besides, I joined the Fatui because I wanted more opportunities to battle. But, somehow I can't bring myself to like her. If betrayal was to her benefit, she would turn her blade against the Tsaritsa without hesitation. There's nothing but insanity in her eyes, that's why.

|vo_08_11_title      = 「雄鶏」について…
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About [[Pulcinella|The Rooster]]
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Rooster.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = 俺は義理や人情といったものがよく分からない。けど、彼が本当に俺のことを助けたいと思っているのは知っている。俺を見る時の彼の眼差しは、まるで家族を見るもののようだよ。ああ、そういえば、トーニャとテウセルからの手紙には、彼がうちに送ってくれたパイやプレゼントのことがよく書いてある。どうやら、俺が冬国を離れている間、彼は約束通り、俺の家族の面倒をよく見てくれているみたいだ。
|vo_08_11_rm         = Ore wa giri ya ninjou to itta mono ga yoku wakaranai. Kedo, kare ga hontou ni ore no koto wo tasuketai to omotteiru no wa shitteiru. Ore wo miru toki no kare no mezashi wa, maru de kazoku wo miru mono no you da yo. Aa, sou ieba, Toonya to Teuseru kara no tegami ni wa, kare ga uchi ni okutte kureta pai ya purezento no koto ga yoku kaite aru. Dou yara, ore ga tougoku wo hanareteiru aida, kare wa yakusoku-doori, ore no kazoku no mendou wo yoku mite kureteiru mitai da.
|vo_08_11_tl         = I don't really understand things like social obligations and customs. But, I know he truly wants to help me. The way he looks at me, it's as if he's viewing me as his family. Ah, speaking of which, in the letters from Tonia and Teucer, they often write about pies and presents he brought to our house. It seems that while I'm away from Snezhnaya, he's been taking good care of my family, as he promised.

|vo_08_12_title      = 「傀儡」について…
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About [[Sandrone|Marionette]]
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Marionette.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = 研究に没頭している人らしい。ということは、あれらの機械も彼女と何か関係があるんだろうか。とにかく、彼女と会ったのはたった数回だけだというのに、いつも俺を殺したそうな目で見てくる。彼女を怒らせるようなことをした覚えは、まったくないんだけどね。
|vo_08_12_rm         = Kenkyuu ni bottou shiteiru hito rashii. To iu koto wa, arera no kikai mo kanojo to nanika kankei ga aru ndarou ka. Tonikaku, kanojo to atta no wa tatta suukai dake da to iu no ni, itsumo ore wo koroshitasou na me de mite-kuru. Kanojo wo okoraseru you-na koto wo shita oboe wa, mattaku nai nda kedo ne.
|vo_08_12_tl         = Apparently, she's quite absorbed into her research. Does that mean that those machines have anything to do with her? Anyway, even though I've only met her a few times, every time she looks at me like as if she wants to kill me. I have no idea that what I possibly could have done to make her angry, though.

|vo_08_13_title      = 「富者」について…
|vo_08_13_friendship = 4
|vo_08_13_subtitle   = About [[Pantalone|Regrator]]
|vo_08_13_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Regrator.ogg
|vo_08_13_tx         = ああ、「壮大な計画」ばかり考えているあの野心家のことか。彼の理論はまったくもって頭に入ってこないよ。とにかく、不測の事態に備えた資本が十分にあるならそれでいい。
|vo_08_13_rm         = Aa, "soudai na keikaku" bakari kangaeteiru ano yashinka no koto ka. Kare no riron wa mattaku motte atama ni haitte-konai yo. Tonikaku, fusoku no jitai ni sonaeta shihon ga juu ni aru nara sore de ii.
|vo_08_13_tl         = Ah, about that ambitious guy who thinks of only "grand plans", huh. His theories won't get through my head, anyway. Well, if he can keep the funds stocked up for the unexpected, I'm fine with that.

|vo_08_14_title      = 「淑女」について…
|vo_08_14_friendship = 4
|vo_08_14_quest      = Omnipresence Over Mortals
|vo_08_14_subtitle   = About [[La Signora|The Fair Lady]]
|vo_08_14_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Fair Lady.ogg
|vo_08_14_tx         = 君も知っていると思うけど、俺は彼女と馬が合わないんだ。それに、今となっては、彼女のことを語る必要もないだろう。ファトゥスにとって、死期は自分で決められるようなものじゃない…でも安心してくれ、何があろうとも、俺は全力で生きていくから。
|vo_08_14_rm         = Kimi mo shitteiru to omou kedo, ore wa kanojo to uma ga awanai nda. Sore ni, ima to natte wa, kanojo no koto wo kataru hitsuyou mo nai darou. Fatusu ni totte, shiki wa jibun de kimerareru you-na mono ja nai... De mo anshin shite kure, nani ga arou to mo, ore wa zenryoku de ikite-iku kara.
|vo_08_14_tl         = You may know it already, but I never got along with her. Besides, there's no need to talk anything about her anymore at this point. As a Fatui Harbinger, death isn't what you can decide by yourself... But don't worry, no matter what happens, I'll stay alive with everything I've got.

|vo_08_15_title      = 「散兵」について…
|vo_08_15_friendship = 4
|vo_08_15_quest      = Omnipresence Over Mortals
|vo_08_15_subtitle   = About [[Scaramouche|The Balladeer]]
|vo_08_15_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Balladeer.ogg
|vo_08_15_tx         = 彼は「神の心」を手に入れた後、俺たちとの連絡を断ってしまってね。だから、その心を取り戻すために行動を開始した。俺は色んな場所を回るのは別に構わない。もしかすると、偶然どこかで君に会うかもしれないね。
|vo_08_15_rm         = Kare wa "Kami no Kokoro" wo te ni ireta ato, ore-tachi to no renraku wo tatte shimatte ne. Da kara, sono kokoro wo torimodosu tame ni koudou wo kaishi shita. Ore wa ironna basho wo mawaru no wa betsu ni kamawanai. Moshi ka suru to, guuzen doko ka de kimi ni au kamo shirenai ne.
|vo_08_15_tl         = After he had the "Gnosis" in his hands, he cut all the contacts with us. That's why we planned to take the Gnosis back. I don't mind going around all over, though. Perhaps, I'll run into you somewhere too.

<!-- About Us -->
|vo_09_01_title      = タルタリヤを知る・1
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 覚えておいてくれ、相棒、俺こそがいつか世界を征服する者だ。
|vo_09_01_rm         = Oboete oite kure, aibou, ore koso ga itsuka sekai wo seifuku suru mono da.
|vo_09_01_tl         = Remember this, comrade, I'm the one who will someday take over the world.

|vo_09_02_title      = タルタリヤを知る・2
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship    = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 戦う相手が神でもアビスの魔獣でも、形さえあれば勝てる可能性がある。けど執行官の中には、権謀術数や陰謀とか…「見えない手段」に熱心な輩がいる。俺はそういったつまらないヤツらは性に合わないんだよ。
|vo_09_02_rm         = Tatakau aite ga kami de mo Abisu no majuu de mo, katachi sae areba kateru kanousei ga aru. Kedo Shikkoukan no naka ni wa, kenboujussuu ya inbou to ka... "Mienai shudan" ni nesshin-na yakara ga iru. Ore wa sou itta tsumaranai yatsu-ra to wa shou ga awanai nda yo.
|vo_09_02_tl         = Whether the enemy be a god or a monster from the abyss, as long as it has a shape, there's the possibility of winning. But among the Harbingers, there are those who are dedicated to "invisible tactics" like trickery and deceit... I don't get along with boring people like them.

|vo_09_03_title      = タルタリヤを知る・3
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship    = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = ここの空と故郷の空は繋がっている。顔を上げて雪のような月光を見ると、故郷の人々も同じ月を見ているのかと思いを馳せてしまう。弟や妹は…優れた戦士になれているだろうか？
|vo_09_03_rm         = Koko no sora to furusato no sora wa tsunagatte iru. Kao wo agete yuki no you-na gekkou wo miru to, furusato no hitobito mo onaji tsuki wo mite iru no ka to omoi wo hasete shimau. Otoutou ya imouto wa... sugureta senshi ni narete iru darou ka?
|vo_09_03_tl         = The sky here is connected to the sky of my homeland. When I raise my head and see the snow-like moonlight, the thought that the people of my homeland might be watching the same moon passes through my mind. My little brothers and sisters... I wonder if they've become good warriors?

|vo_09_04_title      = タルタリヤを知る・4
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship    = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 相棒、これだけは忘れるなよ。殺し合う時、「燃えてきた」なんて馬鹿な言葉で自分を奮い立たせるな。燃え尽きれば、灰以外何も残らない。何があっても、生き抜くんだ。
|vo_09_04_rm         = Aibou, kore dake wa wasureru na yo. Koroshiau toki, "moete kita" nante baka-na kotoba de jibun wo furuitataseru na. Moetsukireba, hai ihai nani mo nokoranai. Nani ga atte mo, ikinuku nda.
|vo_09_04_tl         = Comrade, don't forget this. When killing each other, don't incite yourself with stupid words like "I'm starting to heat up". You'll become burned out, and nothing will remain but ashes. No matter what happens, you must survive.

|vo_09_05_title      = タルタリヤを知る・5
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship    = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 時間が経つのは早いものだ。いつか君に、俺が世界を征服して、神の王座を踏みつける姿を見せてあげるよ。それまで、絶対に倒れるなよ、相棒！
|vo_09_05_rm         = Jikan ga tatsu no wa hayai mono da. Itsuka kimi ni, ore ga sekai wo seifuku shite, kami no ouza wo fumitsukeru sugata wo misete ageru yo. Sore made, zettai ni taoreru na yo, aibou!
|vo_09_05_tl         = Time passes fast. Someday, I'll have you watch me as I take over the world and tread on the thrones of the gods. Until then, you must stay alive, comrade!

<!-- Miscellaneous II -->
|vo_10_01_title      = タルタリヤの趣味…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 氷上の穴釣りと決闘には通ずるものがある、その心は我慢強さと決断だよ。そういえば、これは人生においてあらゆる局面で使えると思わないかい？
|vo_10_01_rm         = Hyoujou no anadzuri to kettou ni wa tsuuzuru mono ga aru, sono kokoro wa ganmandzuyosa to ketsudan da yo. Sou ieba, kore wa jinsei ni oite arayuru kyokumen de tsukaeru to omowanai kai?
|vo_10_01_tl         = There's a connection between ice fishing and battle, and that essence is fortitude and decisiveness. Speaking of which, don't you think that this is useful in many areas of life?

|vo_10_02_title      = タルタリヤの悩み…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = ん？悩み…君と一緒にいると、いつも挑戦し甲斐のある強敵に出会えるから、悩みなんてつまらないことを考える暇もないよ。
|vo_10_02_rm         = N? Nayami... Kimi to issho ni iru to, itsumo chousen shi kai no aru kyouteki ni deaeru kara, nayami nante tsumaranai koto wo kangaeru hima mo nai yo.
|vo_10_02_tl         = Hm? Worries... When I'm with you, I can always meet strong enemies that are rewarding to challenge, so I don't have time to think of boring things like worries.

|vo_10_03_title      = 好きな食べ物…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = この世界は美味しい料理と心躍る戦闘に満ち溢れている。生きるって素晴らしい！
|vo_10_03_rm         = Kono sekai wa oishii ryouri to kokoro odoru sentou ni michiafurete iru. Ikiru tte subarashii!
|vo_10_03_tl         = This world is full of delicious food and exciting battle. How wonderful it is to be alive!

|vo_10_04_title      = 嫌いな食べ物…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 食べ物と武器は同じだ。真の戦士は武器の好き嫌いがないし、食べ物の好き嫌いもない。君も好き嫌いするなよ。
|vo_10_04_rm         = Tabemono to buki wa onaji da. Shin no senshin wa buki no sukikirai ga nashi, tabemono no sukikirai mo nai. Kimi mo sukikirai suru na yo.
|vo_10_04_tl         = Food and weaponry are the same. True warriors don't pick favorites among weapons, or among food. You shouldn't be picky, either.

<!-- Receiving a Gift  -->
|vo_11_01_title      = 贈り物を受け取る・1
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = 美味しいものを食べると、気分まで晴れやかになるね。…さて、君にどうお返ししたらいいかな？
|vo_11_01_rm         = Oishii mono wo taberu to, kibun made hareyaka ni naru ne. ...Sate, kimi ni dou okaeshi shitara ii ka na?
|vo_11_01_tl         = Delicious food lifts the spirits up, too. ...Well then, how shall I pay you back?

|vo_11_02_title      = 贈り物を受け取る・2
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = 料理の腕がだいぶ上がったようだね。腕っぷしも強くなってるのかな？
|vo_11_02_rm         = Ryouri no ude ga daibu agatta you da ne. Udeppushi mo tsuyoku natteru no ka na?
|vo_11_02_tl         = You've become quite a bit better at cooking. Have you gotten better at fighting, too?

|vo_11_03_title      = 贈り物を受け取る・3
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = 想像をしてなかった口当たりだけど。うん…もう少し食べてみよう。
|vo_11_03_rm         = Souzou wo shitenakatta kuchiatari da kedo. Un... Mou sukoshi tabete miyou.
|vo_11_03_tl         = This wasn't what I expected. Hm... I should try a bit more.

<!-- Birthday -->
|vo_12_01_title      = 誕生日…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = やあ、相棒、誕生日おめでとう！むちゃくちゃ殴りたい相手とかいる？いたら遠慮なく俺に言ってくれ！
|vo_12_01_rm         = Yaa, aibou, tanjoubi omedetou! Muchakucha naguritai aite to kairu? Itara enryo naku ore ni itte kure!
|vo_12_01_tl         = Hey, comrade, happy birthday! Do you have someone you really want to punch? If so, feel free to let me know!

<!-- Feelings About Ascension -->
|vo_13_01_title      = 突破した感想・起
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = おっ！少し強くなったみたいだ。誰で試してみようかな…
|vo_13_01_rm         = O'! Sukoshi tsuyoku natta mitai da. Dare de tameshite miyou ka na...
|vo_13_01_tl         = Oh! It seems I became a little stronger. Who should I test this out on...

|vo_13_02_title      = 突破した感想・承
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = 「戦士の力は円のようだ。その円が大きいほど、戦える相手が多い。」これって誰の言葉だったっけ…
|vo_13_02_rm         = "Senshi no chikara wa en no you da. Sono en ga ookii hodo, tatakaeru aite ga ooi." kore tte dare no kotoba datta kke...
|vo_13_02_tl         = "The power of a warrior is like a circle. The bigger the circle, the more enemies you can fight." I wonder whose words those were...

|vo_13_03_title      = 突破した感想・転
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 悪くない！相棒、君のおかげでまた「世界征服」という目標に一歩近づいた。きっと女皇様も、俺がここまで成長することを予想してなかっただろうね。
|vo_13_03_rm         = Warukunai! Aibou, kimi no okage de mata "sekaiseifuku" to iu mokuhyou ni ichiho chikadzuita. Kitto Jokou-sama mo, ore ga koko made seichou suru koto wo yosou shite nakatta darou ne.
|vo_13_03_tl         = Not bad! Comrade, thanks to you, I took another step towards my goal of "world domination." I bet even the Tsaritsa didn't expect me to grow so much!

|vo_13_04_title      = 突破した感想・結
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 相棒、君もちゃんと腕を磨いておいてくれよ！でないと、俺が世界の頂点に立った時、命を賭けて殺し合える相手がいなくなっちゃうだろ？
|vo_13_04_rm         = Aibou, kimi mo chanto uda wo migaite oite kure yo! De nai to, ore ga sekai no chouten ni tatta toki, inochi wo kakete koroshiaeru aite ga inaku nacchau daro?
|vo_13_04_tl         = Comrade, you should hone your skills, too! If you don't, when I stand on the apex of this world, there won't be anyone I could fight to the death with.
}}

|burst_1_tx          = ''(Ranged Stance)'' 止水の矢！
|burst_1_tl          = Arrow of still water!
|burst_1_rm          = Shisui no ya!
|burst_2_tx          = ''(Ranged Stance)'' 逃げられるかな！
|burst_2_tl          = Can you run from this?
|burst_2_rm          = Nigerareru ka na!
|burst_3_tx          = ''(Melee Stance)'' 隙を見せるのは、ほんの一瞬だ！
|burst_3_tl          = They'll let their guard down for only a moment!
